sentences.sContent: He led them away from a marsh.
sentences.sContent_eng: He led them away from a marsh.

sentences.sContent: My urine and excrement are recycled by a system of ducts, pipes, wires, plants, and marsh-microbes, and redeemed into water and food which I can eat.
sentences.sContent_eng: My urine and excrement are recycled by a system of ducts, pipes, wires, plants, and marsh-microbes, and redeemed into water and food which I can eat.
sentences.sCn: 由众多的导管、管线、植物和沼泽微生物构成的系统回收了我的尿液和粪便，并将其还原成水和食物供我食用。

synos.tran: [地理]沼泽的；生长在沼泽地的

remMethod.val: mars(火星) + h → 火星上可能会有沼泽 → 沼泽

trans.tranOther: an area of low flat ground that is always wet and soft
